Trade/Device Name(s): FORA ADVANCED GD40 Glucose, β-Ketone and Cholesterol Monitoring System
Regulatory Class: Class II (glucose test); Class I, meets limitations of exemption (β-ketone and cholesterol tests)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for FORA ADVANCED GD40 system for quantitative measurement of glucose, β-ketone, and cholesterol in capillary whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of glucose, β-hydroxybutyrate (β-ketone), and cholesterol in fresh capillary whole blood from the finger for single-patient home use by patients with diabetes; glucose and β-ketone for diabetes control monitoring, cholesterol for diagnosis/treatment of lipid metabolism disorders.
